trade_card_verification_required_desc: To buy tokens, you need to verify your account.
info_vision_p1: LibertyCent is more than just a token. It's a movement towards creating a decentralized financial ecosystem accessible to everyone. We believe the future of finance is in transparent, fast, and fair technology.
info_vision_subtitle: Why should you accumulate CENT today?
info_vision_item1_desc: Our team is actively working to get the CENT token listed on leading cryptocurrency exchanges. The earlier you start accumulating, the more advantageous your position may be in the future.
info_vision_item2_desc: All funds raised are directed towards developing new features, marketing, and ensuring network stability. Your contribution directly impacts the success and growth of the entire project.
info_vision_item3_desc: The total number of tokens is limited, which creates the potential for their value to increase as demand grows.
info_vision_p2: Holding CENT means believing in a future where everyone has control over their finances. We are building it together.
info_purchase_step1_desc: Specify how many CENT you want to purchase.
info_purchase_step2_desc: Pay for the purchase using one of the popular cryptocurrencies.
info_purchase_step3_desc: Send the exact amount to the specified wallet address.
info_purchase_step4_desc: After the transfer is confirmed, the CENT tokens will be credited to your balance in your personal account.
info_purchase_note: (Crediting can take from 5 minutes to 24 hours)
info_staking_p1: We want your assets to work for you. The staking program is our way of rewarding you for your trust and long-term support. Everything happens automatically, with no lock-ups or complicated actions required.
info_staking_item1_desc: Every Sunday, the system automatically credits you with **6%** of your current balance.
info_staking_item2_desc: Bonuses are added to your main balance, and the following week's reward will be even larger. This is the power of compound interest.
info_staking_item3_desc: Your tokens are never frozen and are always available to you.
info_staking_p2: Simply hold CENT in your balance and watch your capital grow every week.
info_bonuses_daily_desc: Log into your account every day to receive free tokens. The longer your login streak, the bigger the reward!
info_bonuses_invite_desc: You have a unique referral code in your personal account. Share it with friends and earn rewards together!
info_bonuses_invite_item1: Your friend will receive a welcome bonus of **10 CENT** upon registration.
info_bonuses_invite_item2: You will instantly receive **300 CENT** in your balance for each invited user.
info_bonuses_invite_p2: This is the fastest way to significantly increase your balance and help our community grow!
info_whats_next_title: What's Next? From Accumulation to Utility
info_whats_next_p1: We understand the main question on your mind is: "When and how can I use my accumulated CENT?" We are committed to keeping you informed.
info_whats_next_p2_1: All key information about the project's development, including announcements about exchange listings and new product launches, will be published
info_whats_next_p3_1: Additionally, for the most critical updates, we will use
info_whats_next_p3_2: sent to the address you provided during registration. This ensures you won't miss any significant events.
info_whats_next_p4: Your patience and support today are the keys to the entire community's success tomorrow. Every CENT accumulated brings us closer to our shared goal.
info_closing_p1: We believe in a future where finance is open and accessible to everyone. Your participation today is a vital investment in this vision.
info_closing_p2: Thank you for being a part of the LibertyCent story.
